title: Marie Pervenche
overview: Marie Lorieux, a contract worker at the Paris Police Prefecture, is tired of distributing tickets.While walking the streets of the capital, she finds herself mingled with intrigues all wacky and incredible as each other and decides to act alone in its investigations to the chagrin of his head of department who does not know how to do for thereason and her husband, Herv√©, worried constantly.
